title: Was an American husband killed by Isis when he was trying to prove that humans were kind?
subtitle: A widely shared article may confuse some readers about the motives for the murder of a couple in Tajikistan in July 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Americans killed Jay Austin and Lauren Gyujigan in Tajikistan while they were wandering around the Isis region to prove their faith in human kindness.
